snippet: One participant’s experience of Marina Abramovic’s “Generator,” at the Sean Kelly Gallery, in which visitors wear blindfolds and headphones, are led into a gallery and are let go.
abstract: Ken Johnson reviews Marina Abramovic exhibition Generator, participatory exercise in sensory deprivation, at Sean Kelly Gallery.
lead_paragraph: One participant’s experience of Marina Abramovic’s “Generator,” at the Sean Kelly Gallery, in which visitors wear blindfolds and headphones, are led into a gallery and are let go.

headline.seo: At Marina Abramovic’s ‘Generator,’ Blindfolds Are Required
